mapper.select: SELECT STOCK FROM tbl_product WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_product SET STOCK = GREATEST(0, STOCK - #{orderCount}) WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.PRODUCT_ID as productId, p.PRODUCT_NAME as productName, p.PRODUCT_SUB_NAME as productSubName, p.PRICE, p.PRODUCT_TYPE as productType, p.STOCK, p.DISCOUNT_RATE as discountRate, p.PRODUCT_DETAIL as productDetail, p.AMOUNT, p.CALORIE, p.STORAGE, p.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_URL as thumbnailImageUrl, p.CREATED_AT as createdAt, p.MODIFIED_AT as modifiedAt FROM tbl_product p WHERE p.product_type = 'wine'

SELECT p.PRODUCT_ID as productId, p.PRODUCT_NAME as productName, p.PRODUCT_SUB_NAME as productSubName, p.PRICE, p.PRODUCT_TYPE as productType, p.STOCK, p.DISCOUNT_RATE as discountRate, p.PRODUCT_DETAIL as productDetail, p.AMOUNT, p.CALORIE, p.STORAGE, p.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_URL as thumbnailImageUrl, p.CREATED_AT as createdAt, p.MODIFIED_AT as modifiedAt FROM tbl_product p FETCH FIRST 6 ROWS ONLY
